field.name: rebrand
field.label: Remove Branding
field.description: This setting removes the branding from the footer of the template.

field.name: style
field.label: Style
field.description: Select which of the style variations you wish to use.

field.name: logo
field.label: Logo Image
field.description: You can select your logo from the images directory after you upload the image.

field.name: logowidth
field.label: Logo Width
field.description: Select the column width for the logo, the rest of the space will be given to the newsflash module, or if you set it to full width the module will dissapear

field.name: body_font
field.label: Body Font
field.description: Select the default font face for the body

field.name: header_font
field.label: Heading Font
field.description: Select the default font face for the headers

field.name: columns
field.label: Columns
field.description: You can set the default widths and arrange the main columns. Any columns that are unused will just be hidden and the main column will be widened.

field.name: menutype
field.label: Select menu type
field.description: You can select a menu type. Please note that accordion menus are javascript based

field.name: disable-featured
field.label: Disable Featured module button
field.description: Choose if you prefer to disable Featured module button

field.name: text-button
field.label: Label for Featured module button
field.description: Write in the text for opening the Featured module
